General.Name: Obyedinennye Kreditnye Sist
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company United Credit Systems provides various banking and financial services in Russia. It provides banking services, which includes credit products, deposits, mortgage products, payment services, and money transfers, etc. The company also offers leasing services, such as trains, aircraft and vessels, commercial real estate, equipment, vehicles, and machinery. In addition, it engages in the purchase and sale of securities; and invests in securities and properties. The company is based in Moscow, Russia. As of May 27, 2021, Public Joint Stock Company United Credit Systems operates as a subsidiary of JSC NPF Blagosostoyanie.
